info: 树上神秘人-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: To be, or not to be... now that's a tough one. Wait, that sound...{短暂停} Someone's coming?
info: 树上神秘人-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Welp, can't just wait on someone to walk up and <style=Highlight>shake the tree</style> now, can I? <style=SizeSmall>It's so cramped up here... Must've been those three grilled fish I had last night...</style>
info: 树上神秘人-萨飞里-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Ground's cooked from the heat. Found a bit of cover, but the branches have{短暂停} got me pinned here. My goal is right there—so close, yet utterly out of reach...
